chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: Hello! The phone won't charge anymore after being in the water for a short time. It always says it's not an original battery (see attachment), which is very frustrating since we're on vacation right now. What can we do? Best regards Sylke Piper
Thank you for your help.

Hello ecomobile,

the customer has informed us that the device was briefly in water and can therefore no longer be charged.

Can you confirm the exclusion of warranty?


Best Regards,
Sumeyye from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

We are sorry to hear about this. However, as the device was dropped in water, it is hence out of warranty and we are unable to issue a return/refund. Please assist the customer and kindly close the case if no further assistance is required.

Thank you.

Regards,
YR
